RawLine: NEAR_00701_01,刑若梅之妹，摩尼教聖女，血中帶藥性，可治百病。個性天真爛漫，從小未出摩尼教一步，因此不諳世事。目前的心願是看遍天下美景，以及找回藥王谷遺族。,刑若梅之妹，摩尼教圣女，血中带药性，可治百病。个性天真烂漫，从小未出摩尼教一步，因此不谙世事。目前的心愿是看遍天下美景，以及找回药王谷遗族。

Items.mt: The sister of Xing Ruomei, the holy maiden of Manichaeism, has medicinal properties in her blood that can cure all diseases. She has never left the Manichaean Church since she was a child, so she is not familiar with worldly affairs. Her current wish is to see all the beautiful scenery of the world and to find the hereditary family of the Medicine King Valley.
